special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: BLACK WIDOW
special_powers.description: FREE: If Black Widow began your turn on the map, replace her with another character with this trait.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: TECHNOLOGY AND TRAINING
special_powers.description: If Black Widow is on a themed team or your starting force has two other characters from [Black Widow Movie set symbol], opposing characters can't use Improved Targeting abilities to target her or adjacent friendly characters.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: DISINFORMATION
special_powers.description: If Yelena Belova is on a themed team or your starting force has two other characters from [Black Widow Movie set symbol], opposing characters within 6 squares and line of fire can't have their combat values positively modified.

special_powers.name: WELCOME TO RUSSIA
special_powers.description: Running Shot, Stealth.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: THE WIDOWS
special_powers.description: During game setup, Widows Initiate counts as two characters for themed teams. (Each can increase your TTPC uses by +2 and your bonus to roll for first player by +2.)

special_powers.name: MISSION OBJECTIVE: ELIMINATE TARGET
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters with this trait, choose an opposing character or team ability. When targeting that character or opposing character(s) that can use that team ability, Task Force Henchman modifies attack +1.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: BLACK WIDOW
special_powers.description: FREE: If Black Widow began your turn on the map, replace her with another character with this trait.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: MISDIRECTION AND MISINFORMATION
special_powers.description: Leadership. If Black Widow is on a themed team or your starting force has two other characters from [Black Widow Movie set symbol], opposing characters on the map more than 6 squares from her can't be placed within 6 squares of her.

special_powers.name: DEPLOYING ASSETS TO TROUBLE SPOTS ACROSS THE PLANET
special_powers.description: Telekinesis, but only to place other friendly characters of equal or lower points. When she uses it, choose Empower or Enhancement. The placed character can use the chosen power this turn.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: GET CLOSE TO THE TARGET
special_powers.description: When Widows Recruit starts the game, for all characters with this trait, choose an opposing character or team ability. When Widows Recruit uses Poison, she deals penetrating damage to that character or opposing character(s) that can use that team ability.

special_powers.name: MISSION OBJECTIVE: HONING MY SKILLS
special_powers.description: When another character within line of fire rolls a single d6, you may place a die on this card with that result, replacing any die already here. When Taskmaster would roll a single d6, you may instead remove the d6 from his card and use that result.

special_powers.name: TWO SIDES OF THE COIN
special_powers.description: Red Guardian does not count against themed teams and can use Willpower if your starting force includes a character named Black Widow.

special_powers.name: THE PUBLIC FACE OF HEROISM
special_powers.description: Defend, Invulnerability.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: BLACK WIDOW
special_powers.description: FREE: If Black Widow began your turn on the map, replace her with another character with this trait.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: UNCERTAIN ALLEGIANCES
special_powers.description: If Black Widow is on a themed team or your starting force has two other characters from [Black Widow Movie set symbol], and an opposing character is generated or placed on the map from a Sideline within 6 squares of her, after resolutions both you and your opponent roll a d6. If your result is higher, give that character two action tokens.

special_powers.name: WHO CAN YOU TRUST?
special_powers.description: Smoke Cloud as FREE. Opposing characters occupying her Smoke Cloud Markers can't use Improved Abilities or Team Abilities.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: DEFENDING THE WIDOWS
special_powers.description: If Yelena Belova is on a themed team, your maximum number of Themed Team Probability Control uses this game is 6 (instead of 3).

special_powers.name: THE OLD WAYS
special_powers.description: Stealth, Plasticity. When Yelena Belova uses Themed Team Probability Control, she isn't given an action token.

special_powers.name: NEVER GOOD ENOUGH
special_powers.description: Defend, Super Senses.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: FIND THEIR WEAKNESS AND USE IT
special_powers.description: If Widows Spy is on a themed team or your starting force has two other characters from [Black Widow Movie set symbol], she can use Outwit, but only to target adjacent characters.

special_powers.name: HIDING IN PLAIN SIGHT
special_powers.description: Stealth. Lines of fire drawn to Widows Spy are blocked if she is adjacent to printed hindering or printed blocking terrain.

special_powers.name: MISSION OBJECTIVE: SHOCK AND AWE
special_powers.description: When Task Force Mercenary damages 2+ opposing characters with an attack, after resolutions give each hit character an action token.

special_powers.name: WE CAN USE MORE FIREPOWER, BOSS!
special_powers.description: If a friendly character has missed with an attack this turn, Task Force Mercenary modifies attack +1.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: BLACK WIDOW
special_powers.description: FREE: If Black Widow began your turn on the map, replace her with another character with this trait.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: BAIT AND SWITCH
special_powers.description: If Black Widow is on a themed team or your starting force has two other characters from [Black Widow Movie set symbol], and hits an opposing character that's equipped, both you and your opponent roll a d6. If your result is higher, equip that opposing equipment to a friendly character (even if it has Equip (Friendly)).

special_powers.name: ESCRIMA SKIRMISH
special_powers.description: Quake. When Black Widow uses it, after resolutions give each hit character an action token.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: APEX OF TRAINING
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, if Widows Spy is on a themed team or your starting force has two other characters from [Black Widow Movie set symbol], you may choose a standard power that a friendly character has printed on their card. Until your next turn, Widows Assassin can use that power.

special_powers.name: SURPRISE THE TARGET
special_powers.description: Shape Change, Stealth.

special_powers.name: MISSION OBJECTIVE: I AM THE MISSION
special_powers.description: Leadership, but only if Taskmaster is on a themed team or your starting force has two other characters from [Black Widow Movie set symbol]. When he uses it and succeeds, he may also remove an action token from a friendly character with the Task Force keyword (including himself).

special_powers.name: THE PANTHER'S MOVES, AND HIS CLAWS
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Flurry. FREE: Make a close attack but only to target an opposing character that missed Taskmaster since your last turn.

special_powers.name: HUNDREDS OF PERFECTLY-REPLICATED FIGHTING STYLES
special_powers.description: Toughness, Willpower. At the beginning of your turn choose Combat Reflexes -or- Energy Shield/Deflection -or- Mastermind. Taskmaster can use the chosen power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: FIGHTING AN ENTIRE SQUAD
special_powers.description: CLOSE: Made a close attack targeting up to 3 characters within 5 squares and line of fire, regardless of adjacency. Instead of normal damage, he deals his printed damage to each hit target.

special_powers.name: NOT JUST A KNOCK-OFF
special_powers.description: Leadership. When Red Guardian uses it and succeeds, modify his combat values except damage +1 until your next turn. If he failed, an opposing character chooses attack -or- defense and modifies that combat value +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: PATIENCE...
special_powers.description: FREE: If Black Widow is on a themed team or your starting force has two other characters from [Black Widow Movie set symbol], you may remove 2 Tradecraft tokens and if you did, while Black Widow is on the map standard friendly characters can't have their attack rolls of 10 or more rerolled, and opposing characters targeting those characters can't have their attack rolls of 4 or less rerolled.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: ...AND OPPORTUNITY
special_powers.description: Stealth. Black Widow starts the game with 5 Tradecraft tokens. FREE: Remove a Tradecraft token to choose an opposing character within 6 squares and line of fire. Until your next turn that character can't use a standard power until it's displayed on their dial (as a colored square) and can't have their combat values positively modified.

special_powers.name: CLEARING THE LEDGER
special_powers.description: STOP. When this power is first revealed, remove all of Black Widow's Tradecraft tokens and heal her that many clicks.

special_powers.name: WEB OF INTRIGUE
special_powers.description: Leadership, Outwit. FREE: Remove a Tradecraft token to generate a [Black Widow Movie set symbol] #003 Widows Initiate -or- a [Black Widow Movie set symbol] #006 Widows Recruit on click #1.

special_powers.name: NICE TRICK, MIND IF I STEAL IT?
special_powers.description: When an opposing character targets Taskmaster with an attack, after resolutions you may choose a standard speed, attack or damage power that character can use. Taskmaster can use the chosen power until he chooses again. // When Taskmaster attacks a single character, modify his attack +1 for each standard power he can use that the targeted character can also use.

special_powers.name: I'VE GOT A MISSION TO DO
special_powers.description: Running Shot, Sidestep, Stealth.

special_powers.name: YEAH, I'VE SEEN A GUY DO THAT BEFORE
special_powers.description: Super Senses, Toughness. When Taskmaster is targeted by an attack modify his defense +1 for each standard power he can use that the attacking character can also use.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: SECRET MISSION
special_powers.description: Hypersonic Speed. When Black Widow uses it and hits with a close attack, if she's on a themed team or your starting force has two other characters from [Black Widow Movie set symbol], after resolutions you may place the hit character in any square she moved through after the attack. If you do, deal them 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: JUST ENOUGH GAS IN THE TANK
special_powers.description: FREE: Once per game, halve speed, then move. // When Black Widow leaves the map, generate a heavy object in one of her squares. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: TIME TO GET OFF THE BIKE
special_powers.description: During force construction, you may include a character named Black Widow of 75 points or less on your Sideline. The first time Black Widow would be KO'd, instead replace her with that Black Widow on its last non-KO click then roll a d6 and heal that Black Widow half the result. This game, that Black Widow can't be healed any other way. Protected: Pulse Wave.
